topic_description: Sports and Fitness research applies AI to performance analysis, injury prevention, training optimization, tactical strategy, and athlete monitoring. This field explores computer vision for movement analysis, wearable sensor data processing, predictive models for performance and injury risk, game strategy optimization, and personalized training recommendations. Researchers develop methods for extracting insights from sports data, optimizing athletic performance, supporting coaching decisions, and creating systems that help athletes train smarter while reducing injury risk.
